name: generalization_verification
description: Verify memory generalizes beyond exact matches

tests.description: Recognize paraphrased versions of learned content
test_paraphrases: When containers fail, Kubernetes restarts them
Failed containers are auto-restarted by Kubernetes

tests.description: Learning about one example transfers to related concepts
learn: Docker images are built from Dockerfiles
test_novel: Podman is an alternative to Docker
Container images can be pulled from registries

tests.description: Learn abstract patterns from concrete examples
tests.test_abstraction: Programming languages often have mutable sequence types

tests.description: Unrelated content should NOT benefit from prior learning
learn: Neural networks have layers of neurons
